name: wfsl-admission-guard
description: WFSL Admission Guard core engine and GitHub Action adapter (schema-validated, deny-by-default admission decisions).

scripts.build:action: ncc build action-src/index.cjs -o dist-action && node -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const p='dist-action/index.js';if(fs.existsSync(p)){fs.renameSync(p,'dist-action/index.cjs')}"
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:action
